summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Certbot DNS-01 plugin's RFC2136 implementation, covering configuration parsing, creation and deletion of TXT records, domain lookups, SOA queries with UDP fallback and signed responses, as well as handling of various error scenarios.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of automated SSL certificate issuance via Certbot by ensuring the DNS-01 challenge plugin correctly interacts with RFC2136 dynamic updates and robustly manages DNS operations.
